required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Masked, Parallel-Group, Vehicle-Controlled, Clinical Trial of Reproxalap to Assess the Safety and Efficacy in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-Center, Phase 2, Randomized, Double-Masked, Parallel-Group, Vehicle-Controlled, Clinical Trial to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25% Novel Formulation) Compared to Vehicle in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease

brief_summary.textblock: A Multi-Center, Phase 2, Randomized, Double-Masked, Parallel-Group, Vehicle-Controlled, Clinical Trial to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25% Novel Formulation) Compared to Vehicle in Subjects with Dry Eye Disease

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: The method of assessment is subject-reported ocular dryness score (0 - 100 VAS)

primary_outcome.measure: Fluorescein nasal region score (Ora Calibra® scale)
primary_outcome.description: The method of assessment is Fluorescein nasal region score (Ora Calibra® scale)

secondary_outcome.description: The method of assessment for this outcome is the Fluorescein staining Ora Calibra®
The method of assessment for this outcome is the Schirmer test strip.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Reproxalap (0.25% Novel Formulation) QID to BID
Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution QID to BID

intervention.intervention_name: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25% Novel Formulation) QID to BID
intervention.description: Reproxalap Opthalmic Solution (0.25% Novel Formulation) administered QID for four weeks, followed by BID administration for eight weeks
intervention.arm_group_label: Reproxalap (0.25% Novel Formulation) QID to BID

intervention.intervention_name: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution (0.25% Novel Formulation) QID to BID
intervention.description: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administered QID for four weeks, followed by BID administration for eight weeks
intervention.arm_group_label: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution QID to BID
